Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it will bring to you, I propose a special introductory price of $10800. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a high-value item at a reduced cost. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
